info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 7:58PM CST until further notice by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Paducah KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri...Kentucky...Illinois... Ohio River at Cairo Ohio River at Golconda Ohio River at Paducah. .Heavy rain that fell last week, combined with expected rain this week, will cause continued rises on the Ohio River. The Ohio River at Golconda, Paducah, and Cairo are all forecast to rise above flood stage later this week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Golconda. * WHEN...From late Wednesday night until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 46.0 feet, Flooding begins to affect Rosiclare Illinois. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Monday the stage was 36.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday morning and continue rising to a crest of 44.6 feet Tuesday, March 01. - Flood stage is 40.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
